landing.text: Welcome! Explore our website and discover our facilities. We provide quality service to ensure you enjoy every moment of your stay in San Carlos de Bariloche.

map.title: Discover our location
map.text: Our facilities are located in a comfortable neighborhood. Along Bustillo Avenue there is a supermarket and several stores, so you can get everything you need. If you don't have a car, public transportation offers buses with really good frequency along the avenue. Additionally, the nearest beach is just two blocks away.

booking.title: Your reservation is just a click away!
booking.text: On Booking you can access all the information about reservations and available dates. Besides, you can write reviews and see the ratings provided by other customers.

header.title: About Nueva Serena
header.text: Nueva Serena is located at kilometer 13 of the city of San Carlos de Bariloche, on Bustillo Avenue, conveniently  connecting the complex to the town center.

kitchenAndBathroom.title: Kitchen and bathroom
kitchenAndBathroom.kitchen: Fully equipped kitchen with a microwave. If you like cooking, enjoy the comfort of eating delicious meals at home!
kitchenAndBathroom.bath: The bathroom is very comfortable and includes all the essential features needed for a really pleasant experience.

bedrooms.title: Bedrooms
bedrooms.text-sm: The bedrooms offer a combination of double beds and bunk beds. The rooms have windows that allow plenty of natural light and are well-lit. The main bedroom also includes a TV with cable. The beds are extremely comfortable.
bedrooms.text-lg-one: The bedrooms have double beds and bunk beds. The rooms have large windows that allow plenty of natural light.
bedrooms.text-lg-two: The main room includes a TV with cable for entertainment. Enjoy our beds, which are extremely comfortable.
bedrooms.text-lg-three: You will be able to sleep soundly and recharge your energy to keep enjoying your experience in Bariloche!

living.title: Living room
living.text-sm: The living-dining room is a comfortable and spacious area. It is well-decorated. Windows provide excellent lighting and great ventilation. Your experience will be enjoyable with cozy furniture, a television, and a relaxing couch.
living.text-lg-one: The living-dining room is a spacious and comfortable area. Large windows provide great lighting and ventilation.
living.text-lg-two: You will find it pleasant to have cozy furniture, a television, and a comfortable couch. It also has a heater.
living.text-lg-three: If you're looking to relax, the room has all the amenities you need to feel at home. Please, enjoy your stay!

form.title: Contact by
form.text-large: If you want to know more about us, if have any questions, please feel free to contact us. We will respond you as soon as possible.
form.text-short: If you want to know more about us, please contact us!
